svg.content:

width="65" height="64" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-2" value="6" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="734.5" y="179.5" width="16" height="16" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-4" value="" style="verticalLabelPosition=bottom;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;verticalAlign=top;strokeWidth=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.misc.mail2;strokeColor=#999999;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="734.5" y="225" width="20" height="12" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-5" value="<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: center; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">Notifiaction&nbsp;</span><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: center; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">delivered to&nbsp;</span></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: center; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">channel</span></div>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="754.5" y="170" width="65.5" height="55" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <UserObject label="1. Create a Slack API key.
2. Save the Slack API key value in GCP Secret Manager with the secret name `GCP_CLOUDBUILD_SLACK_WEBHOOK`.
3. Create GCS Storage.
4. Edit the file `slack.json` and copy it to the created GCS.
5. Edit the file `slack.yaml` and copy it to the created GCS.
6. Create a Service Account with --role=roles/run.invoker role.
7. Deploy the notifier service on Cloud Run:

gcloud run deploy service-name \
--region=europe-west1 \
--image=us-east1-docker.pkg.dev/gcb-release/cloud-build-notifiers/slack:slack-1.15.0 \
--no-allow-unauthenticated \
--update-env-vars=CONFIG_PATH=gs://<GCS NAME>/slack.yaml,PROJECT_ID=<PROJECT NAME> \
--service-account=<SA NAME>@<PROJECT NAME>.iam.gserviceaccount.com
" link="Here's the translation of the provided steps:


1. Create a Slack API key.
2. Save the Slack API key value in GCP Secret Manager with the secret name `GCP_CLOUDBUILD_SLACK_WEBHOOK`.
3. Create GCS Storage.
4. Edit the file `slack.json` and copy it to the created GCS.
5. Edit the file `slack.yaml` and copy it to the created GCS.
6. Create a Service Account.
7. Deploy the notifier service on Cloud Run:


```bash
gcloud run deploy service-name \
--region=europe-west1 \
--image=us-east1-docker.pkg.dev/gcb-release/cloud-build-notifiers/slack:slack-1.15.0 \
--no-allow-unauthenticated \
--update-env-vars=CONFIG_PATH=gs://<GCS NAME>/slack.yaml,PROJECT_ID=<PROJECT NAME> \
--service-account=<SA NAME>@<PROJECT NAME>.iam.gserviceaccount.com
```" id="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-6"> <mxCell style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="360" width="770" height="270" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <mxCell id="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-11" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.25;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;curved=0;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;flowAnimation=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-7" target="REsr3TymcUuA2FKAdeOi-11"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-7" value="Cloud
Storage" style="sketch=0;html=1;verticalAlign=top;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;align=center;spacingTop=-6;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#999999;shape=image;aspect=fixed;imageAspect=0;image=data:image/svg+xml,;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="349" y="39" width="42" height="34" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-10" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;curved=0;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;flowAnimation=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-9" target="REsr3TymcUuA2FKAdeOi-11"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-9" value="Secret
Manager" style="sketch=0;html=1;verticalAlign=top;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;align=center;spacingTop=-6;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#999999;shape=image;aspect=fixed;imageAspect=0;image=data:image/svg+xml,;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="588" y="44.5" width="42" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-12" value="<div style="text-align: center;"><span style="text-wrap: nowrap;">Slack API key</span></div>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;glass=0;rounded=0;shadow=0;opacity=10;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;textShadow=0;labelBorderColor=none;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="501.15" y="30" width="88.85" height="28" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Cb-K8gvG46bSTwxhXS_8-13" value="<div style="text-align: center;"><span style="text-wrap: nowrap;">slack.json</span></div><div style="text-align: center;"><span style="text-wrap: nowrap;">slack.yaml</span></div>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;glass=0;rounded=0;shadow=0;opacity=10;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;textShadow=0;labelBorderColor=none;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="403.3" y="19" width="108.85" height="39" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

a.xlink:href:
https://app.diagrams.net/Here's the translation of the provided steps:
1. Create a Slack API key. 2. Save the Slack API key value in GCP Secret Manager with the secret name `GCP_CLOUDBUILD_SLACK_WEBHOOK`. 3. Create GCS Storage. 4. Edit the file `slack.json` and copy it to the created GCS. 5. Edit the file `slack.yaml` and copy it to the created GCS. 6. Create a Service Account. 7. Deploy the notifier service on Cloud Run:
```bash gcloud run deploy service-name \ --region=europe-west1 \ --image=us-east1-docker.pkg.dev/gcb-release/cloud-build-notifiers/slack:slack-1.15.0 \ --no-allow-unauthenticated \ --update-env-vars=CONFIG_PATH=gs://<GCS NAME>/slack.yaml,PROJECT_ID=<PROJECT NAME> \ --service-account=<SA NAME>@<PROJECT NAME>.iam.gserviceaccount.com ```

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 768px; height: 1px; padding-top: 348px; margin-left: 12px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. Create a Slack API key.
2. Save the Slack API key value in GCP Secret Manager with the secret name `GCP_CLOUDBUILD_SLACK_WEBHOOK`.
3. Create GCS Storage.
4. Edit the file `slack.json` and copy it to the created GCS.
5. Edit the file `slack.yaml` and copy it to the created GCS.
6. Create a Service Account with --role=roles/run.invoker role.
7. Deploy the notifier service on Cloud Run:
gcloud run deploy service-name \
--region=europe-west1 \
--image=us-east1-docker.pkg.dev/gcb-release/cloud-build-notifiers/slack:slack-1.15.0 \
--no-allow-unauthenticated \
--update-env-vars=CONFIG_PATH=gs://<GCS NAME>/slack.yaml,PROJECT_ID=<PROJECT NAME> \
--service-account=<SA NAME>@<PROJECT NAME>.iam.gserviceaccount.com
